attributes.action: to outlaw A Boards and other advertising boards on our High Street paths etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wokingham Area Access Group have come across many complaints concerning shops / pubs etc. putting A Boards and other such like advertising boards on narrow footpaths within local towns. Although the group have spoken to the local councils about getting them removed,it appears there is no law to stop this happening.  We believe the Prime Minister should introduce legislation to enable the blind, mothers and families with pushchairs, along with other disabled people the right to shop without fear of hurting themselves or being involved in an accident because of these obstacles.
